item.description:
If you are interested in amping up your fields for Advanced Energy Healing, you'll discover that there are proven techniques available which do exactly this!

When Keylontic Science techniques were mentioned at the last meetup, one member requested more info on these. Some members are currently trying out a technique which shields against disharmonic frequencies in the environment, and I look forward to hearing reports on their experiences at the next meeting.

But there are additional Keylontic Science techniques which do much more!

These can be used to amp up for Advanced Energy Healing, strengthening ones fields and shields, as well as increasing the energy-holding capacity of one's multi-dimensional bio-spiritual energy template.

This should be a VERY interesting meeting!

If you don't know what Keylontic Science is, check out the definition on this web-page:

keylonticdictionary.org/Words/K/Keylonta.htm

Don't forget to first insert the prefix http://www.... before attempting to bring up the web-page.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the lady with long black hair and a BIG smile!
item.name: Amping up for Advanced Energy Healing Technologies
